author: chfast
content: I have crazy idea to compile this Python EVM to a shared library with EVMC interface and use in fuzz-testing.

author: samwilsn
content: Nuitka might be a good avenue to explore for that?

author: samwilsn
content: If you do, and run into any compatibility problems, raise issues. I'd like to keep the spec running on as many platforms as possible.
